title: round sans serif font?
content:
Hi does anyone know the font used in this logo please?

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110516205107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bondpr_5198.gif)
author: simundo

comments.content: [Korataki Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20110516205107/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/korataki/) is close, especially if you use an upside down u for the 'n' - it's not quite round enough though so it's not exact. 'PR' looks like it's been messed around with a little, the different sized holes make me think the R has been stretched around - Eurostile might be a good place to start there.
